short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block access to sites that are negatively consuming your life

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Distraction Blocker is a Chrome Extension that "blocks" specified sites by closing their browser tabs whenever they are entered into your browser. This mini-project was built after I stayed up until 4am watching YouTube reels...

*** IMPORTANT ***

- Enable Distraction blocker in your browser. Click on the Distraction blocker icon > Options and formulate your web blacklist there.

- On your browser go to Extensions > Manage Extensions > Distraction blocker > Details and turn on Allow in Incognito so you can't cheat around the blocker.
